name: NotAnotherMatchThreeGame
description:
A Match 3 game with some interesting game modes. Solo, VersusAI, time attack, and One Move. Online 1v1 might happen in the future depending how I feel. I am only planning on working on this for another week or so.

P for pause. Backspace for back.

# Bo means the number of different colors are on the board.

Credits / assets used: docs.google.com/notanothermatchthreegamecredits

I don't play any match three games, so I don't know how they are usually played.  I want to also disclose I don't have anything against Match 3 games, but I think we can agree that there are a lot of them out there.

I made this because I wanted to practice something different. All the gameplay code was done by me. I'll post my source code soon. Credits/Stuff not by me will be posted above/below in a google doc link.

 Let me know if you have any questions, suggestions or run into bugs. And no, I don't want to make different shapes. Thanks for taking the time to play my game and have fun!
